document_data.name: Cavaliers of the Ever-Changing Truth
document_data.orgname: the Cavaliers of the Ever-Changing Truth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cavaliers of the Ever-Changing Truth''' were an order of [[crusader]]s who worshiped [[Istishia]], the Water Lord.
document_data.Organization: Members of this group guarded sites that were sacred to Istishia, escorted emissaries of the clergy, and harassed worshipers of [[Kossuth]] whenever they could. All members of the Cavaliers of the Ever-Changing Truth belonged to races that were natural air-breathers.
